website_summaries.verdict: Whether you love a character from a movie that just released, or a 50-year-old obscure cartoon, it’s easy to find a favorite lovingly designed, adorable, and affordable Funko Pop!.
pros: Available in an incredible range of characters
toys are nearly twice as tall
cons: Some characters look better with round black eyes than others

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Cheque!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if there's much to say about these pops, but I do really love then, I already own a little collection and I'm working on my niece and nephew one, this one was a gift to him and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio De La Hoz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite One!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from me. I purchase Funko Pop, among other, Chewbacca collectibles for my girlfriend and this is her favorite one to date! She removes them from the boxes so I cannot comment on the condition of the box upon being shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a Chewie!
customer_reviews.text: He is incredibly ADORABLE! But I would caution that if ordering multiples the boxes may be damaged during shipping like mine were :( Two out of the three I ordered were "mashed and creased" upon arrival. Order your Pops in twos!
customer_reviews.author: Liz D

customer_reviews.title: Collectable
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a collectable gift for a loved one he expressed it was a good buy we loved it
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Glued to stand
customer_reviews.text: The Solo Funko Pops are not like the other Star Wars Funko Pops, They are glued to their stands.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute little chewie
customer_reviews.text: So cute I gave as white elephant gifts but wished I’d kept it fir myself because the person wasn’t thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Mncarlson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our collection
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our collection. Wish the Star Wars pops came with flatter, less “branded” base.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Gray

customer_reviews.title: He is adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with many other Funko Pops for a Christmas game. This one was my personal favorite. He makes me smile and giggle. Now I need to see the movie. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Storey

customer_reviews.title: So Freakin' Cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love it, Product was As Described and of Good Quality, Very Happy with Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Adorable as ever but the box had a streak on ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable as ever but the box had a streak on it. My secret Santa will love it anyway, I'm sure he'll remove it from the box and then there's no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice display
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy to have it. Displays nicely
customer_reviews.author: Jack Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Great price good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price good quality. A must have for a Solo bublehead collection
customer_reviews.author: Jose E Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It's Chewie and his head bobbles
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it says it does. It's fun and so far has survived quite a long time. Looks cool and my sons love it. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We give them away as prizes at work and everyone love them.
customer_reviews.author: KBunny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Gave to friend for Christmas, and can he really complain about CHEWIE?? NOPE! He absolutely loves it!! Chewie is so cute with his goggles and now my husband is hinting for one for his birthday 😂 will be buying another soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Le

customer_reviews.title: Arrived, but in a damaged state.
customer_reviews.text: It came in one piece, but the box was damaged. The top was ripped from where someone tried to open it, and the left side had some deep scratches on it. It’s perfectly fine if you plan on taking the figure out of the box to display, but if you collect the box too, the way it was handled made it all worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jake16Evans

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was so bummed. I was looking forward to giving this to my son for Christmas but when I received it the goggles were so rigged up you could barely see Chewbacca’s eyes. I love the Funko POP line but this one is completely defective. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved 8, super cute if your a star wars fan
customer_reviews.author: melin

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for myself. Hangs out in my office. Fun
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B.

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter wanted this for her birthday and it is adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her birthday and it is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Pop!
customer_reviews.text: A love Chewy, this Pop is so nice, colors great, perfect finish.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Jose

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my desk!
customer_reviews.text: Funko has the best pop-culture designs; and Chewie (with fur flowing) is a favorite. Looks great on my office desk!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grandison

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Funko! Chewie is an essential for any collector. Excellent shipping time. Product and box arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Quality could use checking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and she loves it but noticed the paint on chewy's teeth is not so great. Other than that it made for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hale

customer_reviews.text: This is grate I got this for my brother because I got him a similar one for Christmas that his dog chewed up he like this one much more
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Scott

product_meta.title: Funko POP! Star Wars: Solo - Chewbacca
product_meta.description: Size:BasicFrom Solo, Chewbacca, as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko! Figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other Solo figures from Funko! Collect them all!
feature_bullets: From Solo, Chewbacca, as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko!
Stylized collectable stands 3 ¾ inches tall, perfect for any Solo fan!
Collect and display all Solo POP! Vinyls!
Funko POP! is the 2017 Toy of the Year and People's Choice award winner

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars571 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
